name: Tereza Klimosová
content: Tereza Klimošová Tereza Klimošová Homepage Research Teaching/Výuka I am an assistant professor at Department of Applied Mathematics (KAM) at the Charles University in Prague. I defended my PhD thesis in December 2015 at the University of Warwick. The topic of my 						thesis was limit structures and property testing, my advisor was 						 Dan Král'. I was a postdoc at École Normale Supérieure de Lyon, LIP, Team MC2. Research interests: graph theory, combinatorics, algorithms Email: first name@kam.mff.cuni.cz Address: Department of Applied Mathematics Faculty of Mathematics and Physics Charles University Malostranské nám. 25 118 00 Praha 1 Czech Republic Design by TEMPLATED.
